languages.text: "Какая разница, что там болтают эти духи, надо прикончить обоих! Эттфатер, обратись к своим воинам и вдохнови их биться за свой дом до последней капли! Они уже принесли жертвы, так напомни им, во имя чего!"

"What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"
languages.original_text: "Какая разница, что там болтают эти духи, надо прикончить обоих! Эттфатер, обратись к своим воинам и вдохнови их биться за свой дом до последней капли! Они уже принесли жертвы, так напомни им, во имя чего!"

traits.locale_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, speak to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home till the last drop! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

"What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, speak to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home till the last drop! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

"What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

languages.text: “这群幽灵在胡说什么，这与我们有什么关系？我们必须把它们两边全都消灭！狼领，对你的战士发表演讲，激励他们为家园而战，直到最后一刻！他们付出了许多牺牲，才走到了这一步……所以你得提醒他们，让他们不要忘记牺牲的意义！”
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

traits.locale_text: “这群幽灵在胡说什么，这与我们有什么关系？我们必须把它们两边全都消灭！狼领，对你的战士发表演讲，激励他们为家园而战，直到最后一刻！他们付出了许多牺牲，才走到了这一步……所以你得提醒他们，让他们不要忘记牺牲的意义！”

languages.text: «¿Qué importa lo que murmuren esos espíritus? ¡Ambos deben ser asesinados! Aett-Vater, ¡diríjase a sus guerreros e inspírelos para que luchen por su hogar hasta el final! Ya han hecho sacrificios para llegar hasta aquí, así que recuérdeles para qué sirvieron».
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué importa lo que murmuren esos espíritus? ¡Ambos deben ser asesinados! Aett-Vater, ¡diríjase a sus guerreros e inspírelos para que luchen por su hogar hasta el final! Ya han hecho sacrificios para llegar hasta aquí, así que recuérdeles para qué sirvieron».

languages.text: 「あの精霊たちが何をしゃべっているかなんて、どうでもいいだろ？どちらも殺さなければならないんだ！アエット＝ヴァテルよ、己の戦士たちに目を向け、故郷のために最後まで戦うよう鼓舞するのだ！ここまで来るのに、すでに犠牲を払ってきた...その犠牲が何のためであったかを思い起こさせるのだ！」
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの精霊たちが何をしゃべっているかなんて、どうでもいいだろ？どちらも殺さなければならないんだ！アエット＝ヴァテルよ、己の戦士たちに目を向け、故郷のために最後まで戦うよう鼓舞するのだ！ここまで来るのに、すでに犠牲を払ってきた...その犠牲が何のためであったかを思い起こさせるのだ！」

languages.text: « Qui se soucie des élucubrations de ces esprits ? Il faut exterminer les deux camps ! Aett-vater, rassemblez vos guerriers et insufflez-leur le courage et la force de se battre jusqu'au bout ! Ils ont déjà fait bien des sacrifices pour venir jusqu'ici, il est bon de leur rappeler au nom de quoi ils se battent ! »
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

traits.locale_text: « Qui se soucie des élucubrations de ces esprits ? Il faut exterminer les deux camps ! Aett-vater, rassemblez vos guerriers et insufflez-leur le courage et la force de se battre jusqu'au bout ! Ils ont déjà fait bien des sacrifices pour venir jusqu'ici, il est bon de leur rappeler au nom de quoi ils se battent ! »

languages.text: "Was schert es uns, wenn diese Geister brabbeln? Sie gehören beide vernichtet! Aett-Vater, wendet Euch an Eure Krieger und inspiriert sie, bis zum Letzten für ihre Heimat zu kämpfen! Sie haben schon viele Opfer erbracht, um es so weit zu bringen. Erinnert sie also daran, wofür diese Opfer waren!"
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"

traits.locale_text: "Was schert es uns, wenn diese Geister brabbeln? Sie gehören beide vernichtet! Aett-Vater, wendet Euch an Eure Krieger und inspiriert sie, bis zum Letzten für ihre Heimat zu kämpfen! Sie haben schon viele Opfer erbracht, um es so weit zu bringen. Erinnert sie also daran, wofür diese Opfer waren!"

languages.text: "Bu ruhların ne gevelediklerinin ne önemi var? Her ikisinin de öldürülmesi gerek! Aett-Vater, yüzünü savaşçılarına dön ve onlara yuvaları uğruna sonuna dek savaşmaları için ilham ver! Buraya gelene kadar hâlihazırda nice kurbanlar verdiler. Sen de onlara o kurbanları ne uğruna verdiklerini hatırlat!"
languages.original_text: "What does it matter what those spirits are babbling about? They both must be slain! Aett-Vater, turn to your warriors and inspire them to fight for their home to the very last! They have already made sacrifices to get this far — so remind them what those sacrifices were for!"
